ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Its odd how this works... Three pairs of Imbrued boots dropped on our server on Saturday alone.  I think its the one piece of imbrued that all the 46+
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"

>on our server, legs
>seem to drop more than anything else, and boots the very least. since the
>bard armor was moved to hate, we only know of one boots ever dropping


Its odd how this works...

Three pairs of Imbrued boots dropped on our server on Saturday alone. I
think its the one piece of imbrued that all the 46+ bards on Sol Ro actually
have in fact. I have seen many bracers drop in hate and in fear recently,
and arms and legs are pretty frequent as well. I've only seen or heard of 1
pair of gloves and helm (and I was the only bard there when they dropped,
woo!) in the last month and a half and no breastplates.

I'm going back next weekend, I sure hope the RNG changes course for me! hehe

P.S. - John, I liked the odds for winning a 1-100 lotto, what are the odds
of rolling a 200 on a 1-200 lotto?

Anthem Diregemaker
Level 50 bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
